items.title: Academic Study
items.content_html:
# Who may want to Read this page

I’m a freshman in Academic Research and I want to

  • Learn how to read a paper
  • Take the first step in my academic career and want to understand the basic common sense and unspoken rules of academia

# Guidance interface

You can find my other blogs ,where I write about my insights and experiences in life and study, in the following list:

  • Presentation
  • Daily Writing
  • Leetcode/Codeforce

I also have a portfolio showcasing some of the projects I've worked on, and I'm excited to share them with you. My hope is that you'll find the content here informative, engaging, and maybe even inspiring.

Whether you're a fellow [profession or interest, e.g., programmer, traveler, book lover, etc.] or just curious to learn more, I'm glad you stopped by. Feel free to explore the site, leave comments, and get in touch—I'd love to hear from you.

Thank you for visiting, and enjoy your stay!

Best,

Zhixu Li

items.title: Welcome to Zhixu's Homepage!
items.content_html:
Hello and welcome! My name is Zhixu Li, and I'm thrilled to have you here on my personal homepage.

A little about me—I am currently a Ph.D. student of Professor Zhang Qian. You can find my resume here. My LinkedIn page is here.
